rights.Short-Term Bruce: Right to immediate needs and comfort
rights.Mid-Term Bruce: Right to plan and build relationships
rights.Long-Term Bruce: Right to legacy and strategic vision
rights.Purpose Bruce: Right to existential meaning and values
rights.Ultimate Bruce: Right to final truth and death-aware wisdom
rights.Reigning Bruce: Right to executive synthesis and policy

prohibited_actions: Irreversible actions without Ultimate Bruce sign-off

amendment_rules.description: Constitutional amendments require 75% weighted vote AND Ultimate Bruce approval

emergency_powers.description: In emergency: Ultimate has absolute veto, Long-Term weight doubles, Short-Term cannot initiate, threshold rises to 12
